overview: Yusuke is 25 years old and lives with his father. He has taken care of him since he lost his mother when he was little. Yusuke has been in a relationship with Shinozaki, a famous gay photographer, as a stylist, model, and lover for the past year or so. The amount of money he receives from Shinozaki is considerable, and he himself does not know whether this is love or compensated dating. He also casually has sex with the owner of a gay bar where he works part-time. One day, Yusuke learns that his father is planning to remarry, and the woman comes to the gay bar where Yusuke works part-time.
title: Ai no labyrinth
